about the PIMSLEUR booklets:
You don't really need the booklet... The booklet contains a bunch of VERY easy to read words that belong to level 1 only. So after level 1 you don't need the booklet anymore. The "reading" part of this course teaches you very little about Italian; a language that's very easy to read anyway...
Great torrent, but why are some of the tracks sampled with 22 kHz, and some with 44 kHz?
